entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:10 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
